entry.headline: Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day Highlights: Triumph, Molson Coors, JPMorgan Chase, Fifth Third Bancorp and PNC Financial Services Group
entry.body: CHICAGO--(Business Wire)-- Zacks Equity Research highlights: Triumph (NYSE: TGI) as the Bull of the Day and Molson Coors (NYSE: TAP) as the Bear of the Day. In addition, Zacks Equity Research provides analysis on JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM), Fifth Third Bancorp (Nasdaq: FITB) and PNC Financial Services Group Inc. (NYSE: PNC). Full analysis of all these stocks is available at http://at.zacks.com/?id=2678. Here is a synopsis of all five stocks: Bull of the Day: Triumph (NYSE: TGI) has been benefiting from acquisitions and internal manufacturing, and the recent Vought acquisition was highly accretive to earnings. The reported EPS of $1.33 surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.08. We also increase our EPS estimate for fiscal 2011 and 2012 after taking into account the synergy benefits to be accrued within a year. Management too has raised their guidance to an EPS estimate of approximately $6.00. The acquisition is expected to add approximately $1.10 to the earnings estimate. Moreover, the company's focus on growing its core businesses along with its strict cost control strategy inspires us to upgrade our recommendation from Neutral to Outperform. Bear of the Day: Molson Coors (NYSE: TAP) reported better-than-expected second-quarter 2010 results, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate by $0.06. The company's healthy balance sheet and cost saving programs support its investment in brands and innovation. However, the company's susceptibility to the global economic downturn and predominant operations in mature and low-growth markets, coupled with stiff competition and seasonality of business, severely undermines the company's future growth prospects and profitability. The recommendation for the stock still remains Underperform as we prefer to wait until the company starts reaping the benefits of its restructuring initiatives. Latest Posts on the Zacks Analyst Blog: U.S. Bank Failures Stretch to 110 U.S. regulators on Friday shuttered Palos Heights, Illinois-based Palos Bank and Trust Company, pushing up U.S. bank failures to 110 so far in 2010. This compares with 140 bank failures in 2009, 25 in 2008 and only 3 in 2007. Although the economy is showing signs of a gradual recovery with the stabilization of large financial institutions, small banks continue to be impacted by tumbling home prices, soaring loan defaults and a high unemployment rate. While we expect the overall economic recovery to gain momentum soon, there remain lingering concerns in the banking industry. Failure of both residential and commercial real estate loans as a result of the credit crisis has primarily hurt banks. As the industry absorbs bad loans made during the credit explosion, the trouble in the banking system goes even deeper, increasing the possibility of more bank failures. Economic threats related to the European debt crisis further add to the concerns. Palos Bank and Trust Company had total assets of about $493.4 million and total deposits of about $467.8 million as of June 30. This recent failure represents another blow to the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) fund meant for protecting customer accounts, as it has been appointed receiver for the bank. The FDIC insures deposits in 7,932 banks and savings associations in the country and promotes the safety and soundness of these institutions. The failure of Washington Mutual in 2008 was the largest in U.S. banking history. It was acquired by JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM). The other major acquirers of failed institutions since 2008 include Fifth Third Bancorp (Nasdaq: FITB) and PNC Financial Services Group Inc. (NYSE: PNC). Get the full analysis of all these stocks by going to http://at.zacks.com/?id=2649. About the Bull and Bear of the Day Every day, the analysts at Zacks Equity Research select two stocks that are likely to outperform (Bull) or underperform (Bear) the markets over the next 3-6 months. entry.headline: Coca-Cola's Douglas to run marketing, brand growth
entry.body:
* Post-bottler acquisition structure outlined in memo

* Coke North America to run marketing, franchise relations

* New unit under Cahillane to handle sales, pricing

CHICAGO, Aug 17 (Reuters) - Coca-Cola Co (KO.N) North America President Sandy Douglas will run marketing and brand growth of the combined North American business when the soft-drink maker closes its acquisition of bottler Coke Enterprises' (CCE.N) assets in the region later this year, according to a Coke internal memo obtained by Reuters.

Douglas will also be in charge of emerging brands, manageabout 70 U.S. bottlers, and lead research and development, according to Coke.

A unit called Coca-Cola Refreshments, run by Coke Enterprises' North America head Steve Cahillane, will handle sales, pricing and trade, customer care and other activities. The restructuring was first reported by Beverage Digest.

Coke's deal, announced in February and expected to close in October, has Coke relinquishing its 34 percent, $3.2 billion stake in CCE and assuming $8.9 billion in debt.

CCE will retain its European operations and buy Coke's Norway and Sweden bottling.

Coke announced its plan to buy CCE's North America business following a similar deal between rival PepsiCo (PEP.N) and two of its largest bottlers.

Coke's shares closed 24 cents higher, up 0.4 percent, at $56.12 on the New York Stock Exchange. (Reporting by Emily Stephenson; Editing by Gary Hill)

entry.headline: UPDATE 3-Li Ka-Shing, Goldman vie for rapid UK rail route
entry.body:
* At least 4 groups pursue UK's only high-speed rail line

* Hong Kong billionaire keen, weeks after $9 bln deal

* Rival teams include enlarged Goldman-Eurotunnel group

* Channel-link sale could yield $2.3 bln for UK gov't

* Morgan Stanley, Ontario-based funds also interested (Adds emergence of Hong Kong's Li Ka-Shing as would-be bidder)

By Quentin Webb and Greg Roumeliotis

LONDON/AMSTERDAM, Aug 17 (Reuters) - Li Ka-Shing has emerged as one of the suitors for Britain's only high-speed rail line, just weeks after the Hong Kong tycoon struck a $9 billion deal to buy the UK's biggest electricity distribution network.

With indicative bids due on Tuesday, Li's Cheung Kong Infrastructure (CKI) (1038.HK) faced at least three rival groups: a five-strong bidding group that included Goldman Sachs and Eurotunnel, a team allied with Morgan Stanley, and a pair of big Canadian pension funds.

The fierce competition for High Speed 1, which has a 30-year concession to run the railway linking London and the Channel Tunnel, is a boon for the British government, which is selling the 109-kilometre (68-mile) line to help cut its budget deficit.

Three people familiar with the matter said CKI was among the groups interested in the line. CKI is 85 percent-owned by Hutchison Whampoa Ltd (0013.HK), which Li chairs. CKI did not immediately respond to an emailed request for comment outside Hong Kong business hours.

On July 30, the Hong Kong billionaire struck a $9 billion deal, using CKI and other vehicles, to buy Britain's biggest electricity distribution network from French power giant EDF (EDF.PA). [ID:nNN2925276]

HS1 also operates London's St. Pancras International station and three others on the route, offering bidders the chance to make unregulated returns through car parking, advertising and leasing shop space.

High Speed 1 expects revenue of 263 million pounds and earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) of 135 million pounds for the year through March 2011, according to a teaser sale document.

People familiar with the matter have previously told Reuters HS1 could fetch 1.5 billion pounds ($2.3 billion).

EUROTUNNEL GROUP GROWS

Among the rival bidders, Goldman Sachs (GS.N) and Groupe Eurotunnel have expanded their team, dubbed GB Speedrail, a consortium spokesman said on Tuesday.

The group, already consisting of Eurotunnel (GETP.PA), Goldman Sachs Infrastructure Partners and MG's Infracapital, has been joined by two financial backers, Britain's Universities Superannuation Scheme (USS) and the infrastructure arm of France's Caisse des Depots et Consignations (CDC), he said.

USS, which looks after the retirement plans of British academics, is the country's second-biggest funded pension scheme. It had 28 billion pounds of assets under management at the end of 2009.

CDC Infrastructure, established this year, holds minority investments in new and existing infrastructure projects, including a new high-speed link between Tours and Bordeaux. It seeks to achieve a 1.5 billion euro portfolio within five years. [ID:nLDE63E20Q]

People familiar with the matter have previously identified two other bidding groups likely to submit indicative offers.

One is made up of Morgan Stanley (MS.N) Infrastructure, 3i Infrastructure Plc (3IN.L) and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority. The second is a Canadian partnership that has allied Borealis, the infrastructure investment arm of Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System, with the Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan.

A spokesman for London Continental Railways, the state-owned parent of HS1, confirmed Tuesday's deadline but declined to comment in detail on bidders.

"We are waiting to see what bids have been received," he said. "It's certainly going well and there has been interest."

UBS is advising London Continental Railways on the sale. Citigroup is advising the Department for Transport.

($1=.6408 Pound) (Additional reporting by Cecilia Valente in London; Editing by Jon Loades-Carter, Hans Peters and Steve Orlofsky)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Amazon Defense Coalition: Chevron CEO Watson Embroiled in Spy Scandal to Undermine $27 Billion Ecuador Trial
entry.body: Kroll`s Sam Anson Identified As Chevron Undercover Operative Running Illicit Program QUITO, Ecuador--(Business Wire)-- Chevron CEO John Watson is again on the hot seat after the company`s growing spy scandal in Ecuador was highlighted on a nationally-syndicated news program only weeks after he ordered that five shareholders arrested at the company`s annual meeting for challenging him over the company`s Ecuador contamination. Watson, who has long been accused of having a personal conflict of interest because he oversaw the purchase of Texaco without properly vetting the company for its $27 billion potential Ecuador liability, is being asked to explain how his company became embroiled in a corporate espionage scandal involving an American journalist, Mary Cuddehe. Watson has remained silent on the issue since the spy story, written by Cuddehe, broke last week in The Atlantic. In the article and in an interview conducted yesterday with Democracy Now host Amy Goodman, Cuddehe said she was offered $20,000 to lie about her identity and gather information for the company under the false pretense of writing a story about the Ecuador environmental trial. Directing investigators to lie about their identity is considered unethical and potentially illegal under U.S. and Ecuadorian law. In 2006, Hewlett-Packard (HP) Chairwoman Patricia Dunn was ousted over a similar undercover operation at HP and later faced criminal charges. "It is apparent that Chevron, under Watson`s stewardship, has authorized an illegal spy operation in Ecuador to undermine the rule of law and it has been ongoing for at least several months," said Karen Hinton. "Mr. Watson needs to explain how Chevron signed off on paying for this kind of outrageous misconduct and disclose which journalists in Ecuador are on Chevron`s payroll." It appears Chevron hired Kroll, the world`s largest investigations firm, to enlist journalists to spy on the plaintiffs in Ecuador, according to Cuddehe, who first exposed the operation after a Kroll operative identified only as "Sam" tried to recruit her. Cuddehe, an Iowa-born graduate of Columbia University with a degree in journalism, documented that Kroll has been running an espionage operation in Ecuador out of neighboring Colombia since at least February of this year. Cuddehe wrote in The Atlantic: "Last February, I got an offer from Kroll ... to go undercover as a journalist-spy in the Ecuadorian Amazon. At first I thought I was under qualified for the job. But as it turned out I was exactly what they were looking for: a pawn." It turns out that "Sam" is none other than San Anson, a former American freelance writer who currently heads Kroll`s Latin American operations out of Miami. Anson has been outted in various blogs on the Internet. His LinkedIn profile, which matches biographical elements referenced in Cuddehe`s story, was quickly removed after her article appeared. Cuddehe indicated that numerous Kroll employees under Anson were working on the Ecuador project from a base in neighboring Colombia. With headquarters in New York, Kroll is considered the largest investigative firm in the world and is publicly traded. "This is disturbing evidence of illicit conduct by Chevron and Kroll, possibly subjecting Chevron's lawyers to sanctions in the U.S.," said Jonathan Abady, an American lawyer who represents the plaintiffs. "It is hard to imagine Kroll engaging in this conduct alone without oversight and direction from Chevron executives and lawyers. Ultimately, the buck stops with Watson." Events described in Cuddehe's article fit with a larger pattern in recent years of unethical and illegal activity by Chevron in Ecuador, where a trial that started in 2003 quickly produced evidence that pointed to the company`s culpability. Lawyers for the plaintiffs have been subjected to death threats and other forms of intimidation, which in 2006 led the Organization of American States to order Ecuador`s government to provide them police protection. Last year, the Amazonian communities accused Chevron of violating the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act in Ecuador by engaging in a "sting" operation where a bribe was offered to help remove the trial judge from the case. An investigation determined that the "sting" operation and bribe offer was made by a long-time Chevron employee, Diego Borja, who remains on the company`s payroll. Watson was also under pressure over Ecuador in May of this year when, at his first annual meeting as CEO, Chevron security officials ordered the arrests of five proxy holders who had come to challenge him over the company`s human rights record. Chevron has admitted that Texaco deliberately dumped more than 18 billion gallons of toxic waste into the Amazon when it operated an oil concession from 1964 to 1990, leading to the decimation of indigenous groups and a dramatic spike in cancer rates. The plaintiffs allege Texaco committed environmental crimes in Ecuador for years and then tried to cover them up with a fraudulent clean-up in the mid-1990s. Several Ecuadorian government officials and two Chevron lawyers who formerly worked for Texaco, Ricardo Reis Veiga and Rodrigo Perez Pallares, are currently under indictment in Ecuador for using a fraudulent laboratory test to induce a legal release from the government. The U.S. law firms employed by Chevron to defend the Ecuador trial are Gibson Dunn, King & Spalding and Jones Day. One or more of the firms likely is overseeing Kroll's work, said Abady. Amazon Defense Coalition Karen Hinton, 703-798-3109 karen@hintoncommunications.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.headline: CompanionLink Announces Microsoft Outlook Sync with Sony Ericsson Xperia X10
entry.body: Two-way synchronization of contacts, calendar, notes and tasks between Xperia X10 and Microsoft Outlook, IBM Lotus Notes, Palm Desktop and ACT! by Sage PORTLAND, Ore.--(Business Wire)-- CompanionLink® Software announces complete two-way synchronization and backup of contacts, calendar, tasks and notes between PC and Sony™ Ericsson™ Xperia™ X10 with Timescape™ UI. CompanionLink offers two methods to sync with Xperia X10 - secure USB sync and automatic wireless sync via Google. PC software such as Microsoft® Outlook®, Outlook Business Contact Manager, IBM® Lotus Notes, ACT! by Sage, FrontRange® GoldMine, Novell® GroupWise, and Palm® Desktop are supported. "CompanionLink is proud to announce support for Sony Ericsson`s Android-powered devices," says Rushang Shah, Director of Marketing for CompanionLink Software, Inc. "With CompanionLink, the Xperia X10 gains new productivity features found in PC software like Microsoft Outlook." CompanionLink`s USB sync with Xperia X10 works in conjunction with DejaOffice™, a contact manager app for Android with business-friendly modules for contacts, calendar, tasks and notes. DejaOffice equips the Xperia X10 with PC-like productivity capabilities found in popular software like Microsoft Outlook. It includes advanced features such as color-coded categories and linking contacts to calendar events. Data from the PC can sync one-way or two-ways using the included USB cable. CompanionLink`s wireless sync via Google lets users sync contacts and calendar data to any Google, Gmail, or Google Apps account. Data then syncs automatically between Google and Xperia X10 through its wireless data connection. Two-way sync is supported so that changes made on the phone are updated on the PC. CompanionLink's sync solutions for the Sony Ericsson Xperia X10 are available for a one-time cost starting at $39.95. Free telephone support is included. More details and a 14-day evaluation version of the software are available at www.companionlink.com/xperia. About CompanionLink Software CompanionLink Software is a pioneering developer of data synchronization solutions for mobile phones and CRM software and services. They are also a leading OEM synchronization and solutions provider for companies like Sage Software®, Google®, Commence® Corporation, and Royal Consumer Electronic Products®. For over 15 years, CompanionLink has helped mobilize information across multiple devices, computers, applications, and web-based services. For more information, please visit www.companionlink.com. CompanionLink is a registered trademark of CompanionLink Software, Inc. Other product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. CompanionLink Software Rushang Shah, 503-243-3400 rshah@companionlink.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

Where there have been dealings in more than one class of relevant securities of the offeror or offeree named in 1(c), copy table 3(a), (b), (c) or (d) (as appropriate) for each additional class of relevant security dealt in. 4.OTHER INFORMATION (a)Indemnity and other dealing arrangements Details of any indemnity or option arrangement, or any agreement or understanding, formal or informal, relating to relevant securities which may be an inducement to deal or refrain from dealing entered into by the person making the disclosure and any party to the offer or any person acting in concert with a party to the offer: If there are no such agreements, arrangements or understandings, state "none" (b)Agreements, arrangements or understandings relating to options or derivatives Details of any agreement, arrangement or understanding, formal or informal, between the person making the disclosure and any other person relating to: (i) the voting rights of any relevant securities under any option; or (ii) the voting rights or future acquisition or disposal of any relevant securities to which any derivative is referenced: If there are no such agreements, arrangements or understandings, state "none" (c)Attachments Is a Supplemental Form 8 (Open Positions) attached? entry.headline: Chevron Honors Davis Wright Tremaine LLP With Diversity Award for Second Consecutive Year
entry.body: SAN FRANCISCO, CA, Aug 17 (MARKET WIRE) -- For the second consecutive year, Davis Wright Tremaine LLP has been selected as one of three recipients of Chevron's Law Firm Diversity Award. Established in 2005, the award recognizes Chevron's law firm partners that have distinguished themselves by demonstrating their commitment to diversity. Chevron -- in recognition of Davis Wright's diversity efforts -- will again make a $5,000 donation in the firm's name to Destination Law School, a diversity pipeline program with the San Francisco Bar Association (Destination Law School was also the recipient of the donation in 2009 as a part of this award). In addition, the firm announced they will match Chevron's donation of $5,000 to launch a partnership with the Los Angeles Metro Debate League, a diversity pipeline program in Los Angeles. "Davis Wright's commitment to these programs that help aspiring lawyers from diverse backgrounds is to be commended," said Josetta Jones, in-house counsel with Chevron Corporation and chair of the legal department's Diversity Council. "The firm truly believes in extending diversity as a core value beyond their walls and into the legal community as a whole, and these pipeline programs are doing tremendous work." Long recognized as a global leader in supporting diversity and fostering inclusion, Chevron has encouraged its business partners to join it in promoting principles and practices that allow all individuals to reach their full potential. "One of the things I know Chevron recognizes, and that we embrace as well, is that you begin to make a difference with partnership and with engagement," said Karen Russell, Davis Wright's manager of diversity initiatives. "We partner with our clients and these organizations and our attorneys actively participate in these programs. The financial contributions are a part of it, but it's not just a check, and a handshake, and 'We're done.' We like to follow the money. It's an investment and a start of a commitment to getting involved." Chevron's donation last year to Destination Law School helped, among other things, pay for 10 students to take bar review courses to help put them on the path to becoming lawyers. But, as Davis Wright partner Salle Yoo noted, the true difference came in the direct involvement with the program and with the students. "Recently, Josetta and I spoke to the students about our experiences as diverse, women attorneys working in different sectors in the law," said Yoo. "Josetta spoke from the perspective of an in-house lawyer with a major U.S. corporation and I talked about being a partner of a large Am Law 100 firm. "After the discussion, one of the students approached me and said he was surprised to see me as the partner from a law firm. You could see that it made an impression on him and convinced him that opportunities exist in the legal profession for minorities. These are the interactions that you strive for, and it happened with the program in San Francisco, and I'm excited to work with my colleagues who are getting involved with the program in Los Angeles." By adding the program in Los Angeles, Davis Wright now has relationships with pipeline programs or minority law student scholarship programs in Northern California, Southern California, Oregon and Washington state. The firm also provides mentoring and coaching programs for diverse associates, including an innovative mentoring partnership program it began last year with client Microsoft. "We appreciate the opportunity to partner with Chevron on diversity and we're honored to receive this award," said Russell. "It reinforces the importance of diversity and inclusion, and it motivates us to continue to partner with our clients and the organizations who share that mission. We're also excited to begin working with the Los Angles Metro Debate League. These debate leagues in urban schools are creating a diverse pipeline of talented high-school students who are interested in and well-prepared for college, law school and legal careers." About Davis Wright Tremaine Davis Wright Tremaine LLP is a national law firm with more than 500 lawyers representing clients based throughout the United States and around the world. For more information, visit www.dwt.com and www.dwt.com/diversity. Additional Information To read more about Chevron's commitment to diversity, visit: www.chevron.com/about/diversity/. For more on Destination Law School, please visit: www.sfbar.org/diversity/destination_law_school.aspx. For more on the Los Angeles Metro Debate League, please visit: http://www.losangelesmetrodebate.org/. MEDIA CONTACT Jeff Segvich (503) 778-5460 jeffsegvich@dwt.com Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Power Assure Joins IBM PartnerWorld Program
entry.body: SANTA CLARA, CA, Aug 17 (MARKET WIRE) -- Power Assure(TM), a leading supplier of Dynamic Data Center Optimization software, today announced it has joined the IBM PartnerWorld(R) program. The IBM Member level designation allows Power Assure to utilize numerous sales, marketing, technical, training and collaborative benefits offered through PartnerWorld. Tweet this: Power Assure joins IBM PartnerWorld Program http://bit.ly/98rZSu IBM PartnerWorld is an award-winning, global program designed to help its business partners increase demand, grow business and improve profitability. As a member of PartnerWorld, Power Assure now has access to the resources needed to begin building and selling IBM-based solutions, products and services. Power Assure has access to IBM's flexible financing options. This resource can provide Power Assure customers with affordable options for a variety of IBM technology solutions. "As a member of IBM PartnerWorld, we are able to provide our customers with a broad array of hardware and software solutions designed to meet the evolving needs of our enterprise and government customers," said Brad Wurtz, president and CEO of Power Assure. "With access to IBM resources, we are able to guarantee the interoperability of our industry-leading data center optimization software with IBM hardware and middleware, simplifying and expediting implementation for our customers using IBM platforms." Participation in PartnerWorld at the IBM Member level provides access to entry-level benefits and support across a broad portfolio of IBM products and technologies. IBM PartnerWorld includes more than 100,000 solution providers, independent software vendors, consultants and integrators. About Power Assure Power Assure is a leading developer of Dynamic Data Center Optimization software for large enterprises, government agencies, and managed service providers. Power Assure's solutions provide visibility, intelligence, and automation to help CIOs, IT directors, and facilities managers optimize capacity, service levels, and power consumption within and across data centers. Headquartered in Santa Clara, CA, the company is privately held with funding from Draper Fisher Jurvetson, Good Energies, Point Judith Capital, and a grant from the Department of Energy. Power Assure partners include Dell, IBM, Raritan, and VMware. For more information, visit www.powerassure.com Contact: Beth Winkowski Power Assure Phone: 978-649-7189 Email: beth@powerassure.com Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Microsoft transforma el ocio en casa y móvil con el lanzamiento de Kinect y nuevas experiencias de Xbox LIVE en Windows Phone 7 y PC
entry.body: Kinect para Xbox 360 traerá el ocio sin mando a Europa a partir del 10 de noviembre, 2010 COLONIA, Alemania--(Business Wire)-- Xbox transformará el ocio en el hogar y móvil este año con el lanzamiento de Kinect para Xbox 360, que se lanza de forma oficial en Europa, Oriente Medio y Africa1 el 10 de noviembre, abriendo un nuevo mundo de juegos sin mandos y de ocio Xbox LIVE. Xbox LIVE y una serie de exitosos juegos en Windows Phone 7 también se lanzarán a finales de año y Microsoft ha anunciado una nueva gama de títulos compatibles con LIVE para PC. Gamescom 2010 es el salón en el que se hará la presentación en Europa de Kinect para Xbox 360, mostrando a los miles de usuarios la libertad intuitiva de jugar sin mando. En la feria se presentarán nuevos juegos y experiencias que demuestran la gran variedad del lanzamiento de los más de 15 títulos Kinect exclusivos, incluidos niveles nunca vistos, nuevos entornos, realizaciones y personajes para "Kinect Sports," "Kinect Adventures," "Kinectimals" y "Kinect Joyride." MTV Games y Harmonix anunciarán nuevas pistas de baile que encabezan las listas musicales para el tan esperado "Dance Central". Antes de la feria, Chris Lewis, Vicepresidente de ocio interactivo en Europa de Microsoft, ha declarado: "Hemos traído la experiencia Kinect a Europa por primera vez en Gamescom, porque es la mayor exposición en la región y estamos comprometidos en invertir en Europa y somos conscientes de la importancia de este continente para el éxito global de la Xbox". El lanzamiento de Kinect el 10 de noviembre no solo transformará nuestra actividad, sino que también cambiará la forma en la que se cada persona utiliza ese ocio. Tú te conviertes en el mando y tienes la posibilidad, junto con tus amigos, de elegir la forma en la que exploráis los juegos y el entretenimiento. "Ya hemos visto una fuerte expectativa en Europa con las ventas de la Xbox 360 de 250 GB preparada para Kinect, consiguiendo un récord histórico en términos de cuota semanal de mercado2". "Este también es el año de expansión para Xbox 360 a nuevas audiencias, nuevos mercados para Xbox LIVE y múltiples plataformas. Con Xbox LIVE en Windows Phone 7, aportamos calidad, coherencia y la comunidad de la experiencia Xbox para los jugadores móviles. Con "Age of Empires Online", "Fable III" y nuevos juegos en desarrollo, añadimos también experiencias sociales y conectadas a nuevos públicos conectados al PC. "Teniendo en cuenta todo lo que vamos a lanzar al mercado este año, gracias a la magia de Kinect, junto con nuestra exitosa gama de juegos, que incluye el mejor juego de 2010, "Halo: Reach ", estamos convencidos de que Xbox 360 es para la familia y que va a ser la consola de ocio y juegos en 2010 y en los próximos años". Te encantará Kinect Las nuevas experiencias de juegos Kinect que se presentarán en Gamescom desvelarán una variedad nunca antes vista de juegos sin mando que mantendrán a los jugadores ocasionales o los ultraficionados entretenidos durante horas. En la feria se podrá ver el juego de kart clásico "Kinect Joy Ride", con nuevas formas de mantener el juego emocionante y original, ya se juegue solo o con amigos, así como las emocionantes nuevas aventuras de explorar lugares exóticos, buscando tesoros y recompensas en " Kinect Adventures". También, un grupo de animales adorables, que te ayudará a explorar el mundo de "Kinectimals" y tres nuevos eventos en "Kinect Sports", que sin duda reunirán a toda la familia en el sofá, se presentarán también por primera vez en el evento. Se multiplican los éxitos de taquilla 2010 ha sido el año en el que han aparecido todos los éxitos de taquilla más importantes en Xbox 360, con un número increíble de terceros que demuestra que una vez más Xbox 360 es el mejor lugar para jugar, incluidos los éxitos de taquilla tan esperados como "Halo: Reach" y "Fable III", que presentarán nuevas capacidades de juego en Gamescom. La nueva era de los juegos móviles Gamescom 2010 también es el lugar para el lanzamiento mundial de la primera oleada de juegos Xbox LIVE que se lanzan en Windows Phone 7 a finales de año. Basado en el trabajo pionero de Microsoft con la Xbox 360, Windows Phone 7 será el anfitrión de una cartera creciente de títulos de Xbox LIVE diseñados por las mentes más creativas del sector de desarrollo de juegos, incluido Microsoft Game Studios. Desde Avatars a Achivements, Windows Phone 7 lleva la potencia de Xbox LIVE a la palma de su mano. Reinventar las franquicias clásicas para PC Microsoft también desvelará la contribución más reciente para el éxito de la franquicia "Age of Empires": "Age of Empires Online". "Age of Empires Online", que combina las características originales en línea con el icónico juego, ofrecerá algo que gustará tanto a los fans como a los nuevos jugadores. Además, Microsoft anunciará el desarrollo de un nuevo juego inspirado en la franquicia "Flight Simulator". Publicados por Microsoft Game Studios, estos nuevos títulos, junto con "Fábula III", previamente anunciado, integrarán plenamente el servicio online free3 "Games for Windows-LIVE" que ofrecerá experiencias de juegos cautivantes y conectados. FIN Acerca de Kinect Kinect para Xbox 360 aporta juegos y entretenimiento a su vida como nunca antes se había visto, sin necesidad de mando. Fácil de usar y muy divertido, Kinect para Xbox 360 permite descubrir nuevas experiencias de juegos y Kinect Hub reúne, en un mismo lugar, tus películas favoritas, programas de televisión, música, deportes en directo y redes sociales. El sensor Kinect te reconoce, responde a tu voz y funciona con cualquier consola Xbox 360 (175 MB de memoria necesaria). Para obtener más información sobre Kinect para Xbox 360, visite http://www.xbox.com/kinect. Acerca de Xbox 360 Xbox 360 es un exclusivo sistema de entretenimiento y videojuegos. Con la llegada en noviembre de "Kinect", Xbox 360 transformará para siempre los juegos y el entretenimiento social en una forma de jugar completamente nueva, sin necesidad de mando. Xbox 360 ofrece la mejor calidad y variedad de juegos, así como la mayor biblioteca de música a la carta, películas en calidad estándar y de alta definición, programas de televisión y juegos digitales, todo en un único lugar. La Xbox 360, el centro de entretenimiento del salón, combina el contenido enriquecido con la red social líder de 25 millones de miembros Xbox LIVE para crear una experiencia de entretenimiento ilimitado que puede compartirse en casa y en todo el mundo. Para obtener más información sobre Xbox 360, visite http://www.xbox.com. Acerca de Xbox LIVE Xbox LIVE es el servicio de entretenimiento para tu Xbox 360, que te conecta con un universo de juegos, películas, TV, música, deportes y entretenimiento social en constante expansión. Xbox LIVE permite practicar los mejores juegos, disfrutar de la biblioteca más grande a la carta en cualquier consola, escuchar millones de canciones y compartir este placer con amigos de todo el mundo. Xbox LIVE también permite el exclusivo entretenimiento en línea sin mando, mediante Kinect, lo que hace que la Xbox 360 sea más intuitiva e interactiva que nunca. Con una comunidad activa de 25 millones de personas en 26 países, que aumentarán a 35 países este otoño, Xbox LIVE, junto con Xbox 360, ofrece un acceso instantáneo al entretenimiento que desee, compartido con las personas que le importan, donde quiera que estés. Para obtener más información sobre Xbox LIVE, visite: http://www.xbox.com/live. Sobre Microsoft Fundada en 1975, Microsoft (Nasdaq "MSFT") es el líder mundial en software, servicios y soluciones para ayudar a los individuos y las empresas a conseguir todo su potencial. 1 Reino Unido, Irlanda, Francia, Alemania, España, Italia, Noruega, Suecia, Finlandia, Dinamarca, Austria, Bélgica, Portugal, Suiza, Países Bajos, Sudáfrica, Rusia, Emiratos Árabes Unidos, Arabia Saudita, Hungría, República Checa, Eslovaquia, Polonia. 2 En Francia, Alemania, Reino Unido e Irlanda 3 Es necesario Internet de banda ancha El comunicado en el idioma original, es la versión oficial y autorizada del mismo. La traducción es solamente un medio de ayuda y deberá ser comparada con el texto en idioma original, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá validez legal. Para más información, solo prensa: Edelman Ben Russell, +44 (0)203 047 2201 ben.russell@edelman.com o Claire Morgan, +44 (0)203 047 4048 claire.morgan@edelman.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.headline: BDNA Signs Microsoft Gold System Center Partner FyrSoft as Value Added Reseller Partner
entry.body: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- BDNA: News Facts * BDNA Corporation has signed a reseller partner agreement with FyrSoft, LLC, a Houston, Texas-based IT service management (ITSM) solution provider focused on the Microsoft System Center platform-based enterprise IT market. * FyrSoft indicates that it plans to deploy BDNA Technopedia, BDNA Discover and BDNA Normalize technologies to speed time-to-solution for a broad array of client projects, including infrastructure health checks, compliance audits, run book automation, system integration and Windows 7 projects. Optimizing the Migration Path * FyrSoft has achieved Microsoft Gold Partner status and has built a strong reputation for expertise in the Microsoft System Center enterprise environment. It views BDNA`s solutions as both complimentary and value-added enhancements to technologies such as Microsoft Systems Center Configuration Manager (SCCM). * In particular, FyrSoft will use BDNA Normalize, informed with deep technical and market data from BDNA Technopedia, to quickly and accurately sort, classify and enrich Microsoft SCCM asset inventory data feeding into compliance reports, infrastructure optimization, software license management, Windows 7 migrations and best practices attainment projects undertaken for FyrSoft clients. BDNA Partner Ecosystem * FyrSoft joins a growing ecosystem of go-to-market and technology partners focused on applying BDNA`s IT Genome Center technologies to client problem solving. * BDNA`s IT Genome Center solution set, which includes BDNA Technopedia, BDNA Discover and BDNA Normalize technologies, helps enterprise IT managers improve the speed and quality of IT management decision making, reduce IT cost of ownership and enhance the value of new IT investment and initiatives. * BDNA Normalize correlates customer infrastructure configuration data generated by Microsoft SCCM or other asset inventory products with information from BDNA Technopedia, the industry`s most comprehensive encyclopedia of technical and product life cycle information containing more than 9.5 million data points on more than 87,000 commercial IT product models and versions. * BDNA IT Genome Center offerings can be resold as products, delivered in the context of managed services or support IT asset management consulting programs. Supporting Quotes Michael Riley, BDNA vice president for North American field operations, said: "FyrSoft has quickly become one of the most respected and focused value added reseller companies in the Microsoft enterprise computing market. BDNA products are a perfect fit for the environments they specialize in - BDNA also offers FyrSoft and its customers faster and surer paths to high quality solutions." Jeremiah Beckett, FyrSoft managing partner, said: "BDNA IT Genome Center technologies, coupled with Microsoft Systems Center, really add value to each other. Most importantly, BDNA makes us heroes when we can go into a client and quickly get to the heart of a management issue or set course for a new initiative in record time. From any point of view, end customer satisfaction is a great competitive advantage, and that`s what we get from partnering with BDNA." Information Resources * BDNA Products and Solutions page: http://www.bdna.com/page/index/solutions * BDNA Technopedia page: http://www.bdna.com/page/index/bdna-technopedia * BDNA Value-Added Partners page: http://www.bdna.com/page/index/value-added-partners * FyrSoft LLC: http://www.fyrsoft.com * FyrSoft products and services brochure: http://bit.ly/ctveTb Key Words BDNA, FyrSoft, Microsoft SCCM, Windows 7, SCCM, System Center Configuration Manager, asset management, software reconciliation, software license management, virtualization, IT consolidation, IT service management, ITSM, BDNA IT Genome Center, BDNA Technopedia, BDNA Discover, BDNA Normalize About FyrSoft Founded in 2009, FyrSoft is a leading Information Technology Service Manager (ITSM) provider that specializes in Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC); Security; Systems Management; and Software Development Services. FyrSoft focuses on using Microsoft System Center based technology to develop, automate, and integrate IT Systems that provide a lower total cost of ownership. Based in the central US and servicing customers throughout North America, FyrSoft provides the full turnkey solutions and point project services you've been looking for to automate data center management and GRC auditing using Microsoft System Center and Forefront management technologies. FyrSoft can help your business fully leverage your investment in Microsoft based products and systems to reduce auditing costs and automate IT processes. To learn more about FyrSoft and service offerings please visit www.FyrSoft.com. BDNA: The IT Genome Company BDNA`s unique IT genome technology enables customers in all sectors of the global economy to achieve deep visibility into what their computing hardware, software, network infrastructure, and technology usage patterns are made of. Informed by Technopedia, a constantly expanding body of knowledge currently covering 9,500,000 lifecycle history data points on 87,000 IT products, BDNA`s Discover asset inventory and Normalize data enrichment solutions help save money and speed time-to-decision for software license optimization, technical controls compliance, information security, green computing, infrastructure consolidation/virtualization, capacity planning, business continuity, and ROI maximization initiatives. To learn what BDNA is made of, visit www.bdna.com or follow us on Twitter, BDNA_ITgenome. IT Genome, IT Genome Center, The IT Genome Company, BDNA Technopedia, BDNA Discover, and BDNA Normalize are trademarks of BDNA Corporation. Other trademarks, registered trademarks or service marks are property of their respective owners. Kulesa Faul for BDNA Cathy Wright, 650-340-1985 Cathy@kulesafaul.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.headline: PennyStockAlley.com Daily Investment Stock Report Alerts: Bank of America Corp., General Electric Company, Intel Corp.,
entry.body: SEATTLE, WASHINGTON, Aug 17 (MARKET WIRE) -- PennyStockAlley.com, a premier micro cap research firm provides subscribers with comprehensive research, in depth due diligence and technical analysis to provide our subscribers with high octane stocks that are typically overlooked by your "Average Joe" Wall St. investment advisors. Ask yourself what is easier to find, a stock that moves from $.01 - $1.00 or a stock that moves from $1.00 - $100.00. PennyStockAlley's Investment Stock Report alerts all investors, large or small to micro cap and small cap companies poised for explosive movement in the market. Find out why thousands sign up daily for our FREE reports! Our detailed reports are available to all interested investors totally FREE of charge. Investors simply need to subscribe at: http://www.PennyStockAlley.com. PennyStockAlley.com Alerts Today's Possible Movers and Shakers: Bank of America Corp., General Electric Company, Intel Corp., and Microsoft Corp. John Paulson, the most successful, high-profile hedge fund manager of the last several years maintained his massive position in gold in his end-of-Q2 portfolio, also holding steady with his large positions in big banks Bank of America and Citigroup. Russian Technologies, a state-controlled industrial conglomerate, plans to create a joint venture to produce medical equipment with General Electric, the head of the Russian firm said on Tuesday. Intel Corporation and Micron Technology Inc. today announced the delivery of 3-bit-per-cell (3bpc) NAND flash memory on 25-nanometer (nm) process technology, producing the industry's highest capacity, smallest NAND device. BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis today made two big stock calls, upgrading Microsoft to Buy from Hold, while reducing Yahoo to Hold from Buy. Micro cap stocks have been on fire lately. In the last several weeks we have seen micro cap stocks that have had gains of 100% to over 2600%. entry.headline: Peru to grow around 8 pct in 2010, says JPMorgan
entry.body:
NEW YORK Aug 17 (Reuters) - JPMorgan will soon revise its growth forecast for Peru this year to around 8 percent from 7.3 percent, the bank's analyst Luis Oganes said on Tuesday.

"Still I wouldn't characterize that as overheating," Oganes told an investor conference in New York. "But there's an output gap that will be closing this year."

Earlier in the same conference, Peru's Central Bank President Julio Velarde said the bank is also expected to revise up its growth forecast for this year, currently at 6.6 percent. (Reporting by Walter Brandimarte; Editing by Theodore d'Afflisio)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Panduit`s Unified Physical InfrastructureSM (UPI) Approach Enables IBM to Make Its Enterprise Modular Data Center Solution More Efficient and Sustainable
entry.body: TINLEY PARK, Ill.--(Business Wire)-- Panduit Corp., a global leader in Unified Physical InfrastructureSM (UPI) based solutions, is partnering with IBM to bring large modular, plug and play data centers to market. Enterprise Modular Data Centers (EMDC) are large modular data centers designed in smaller, standardized modules with the capability to plug in additional capacity over time as needed, such as power and cooling. This approach enables clients to bring new, highly scalable data centers online three-to-six months sooner than a custom designed version. Panduit UPI-based solutions leverage an optimized physical infrastructure as the foundation to enable convergence across communication, computing, control, power and security systems. These end-to-end solutions drive operational and financial advantages across the enterprise, allowing businesses to improve reliability, reduce costs, heighten agility and support sustainability initiatives. Panduit shares IBM`s vision that data centers can be constructed in a flexible way with the ability to scale on-demand and significantly reduce initial capital and operating costs. By teaming with IBM on the EMDC initiative, Panduit is helping enterprises deploy sustainable technology infrastructures that meet evolving business requirements with a flexible and scalable on-demand data center solution that defers up to 40 percent of the capital expense and 50 percent of the operational expense until capacity is required. "Panduit and IBM share a similar vision to help organizations optimize their power, cooling, and space needs within the data center environment," said Vineeth Ram, Panduit VP of Global Strategic Marketing. "By supporting IBM`s family of data center solutions, such as EMDC, with our own UPI-based solutions that optimize the physical infrastructure, together we can make that vision a reality." "More than 60% of CIOs around the world are expecting significant change brought by soaring data volumes, increasingly complex analyses and ever larger populations of users," said Steven Sams, IBM VP of Global Site and Facilities Services. "With today`s announcements IBM and partners like Panduit demonstrate our ability to lead data center innovation to meet changing requirements with a very flexible plug and play approach, allowing data center capabilities to be added - and paid for - when and where they are needed." Solutions from Panduit`s complete line of High Speed Data Transport (HSDT) products provided the LAN and SAN infrastructure for the EMDC. Panduit® QuickNet™ pre-terminated fiber and copper solutions are an ideal fit for the unique infrastructure requirements of enterprise data center solutions such as IBM`s EMDC, where highly reliable and scalable cabling infrastructure must support high density and mission-critical network applications. Providing up to 96 fiber and 48 copper connections in a single rack space, cassette-based QuickNet assemblies maximize the use of valuable EMDC real estate while allowing rapid, error-free installation to ensure the highest level of performance. Panduit® Net-Access™ and new Net-SERV™ cabinet systems house active and passive IT assets and deliver energy efficiencies through shared thermal and cable management concepts. When deployed as an integrated solution, Panduit HSDT and cabinet systems for EMDC applications enable data center managers to optimize airflow and reduce energy costs by 25% or more. "In addition to industry leading cabinet systems technology, Panduit brings the unique capability to tightly integrate these cabinet systems with cabling, cable management, pathways, active devices, and related accessories, helping customers conserve valuable data center real estate while managing extreme heat loads and optimizing power and cooling efficiencies," said Jack Tison, Panduit CTO. "Working on the IBM EMDC initiative allows us to apply our high speed data transport, integrated cabinet systems, and software expertise to optimize the IBM platform and promote scalable, sustainable UPI-based data center design practices for these critical applications." Panduit has established long-term collaborative relationships with global industry leaders such as IBM to develop and integrate innovative, holistic solutions for our customers. We continually invest in relationships and resources for solving our customers` greatest business challenges. Customers and partners can learn more about Panduit`s data center solutions at www.panduit.com/datacenter. About Panduit: Panduitis a world-class developer and provider of leading-edge solutions that help customers optimize the physical infrastructure through simplification, agility and operational efficiency. Panduit`s Unified Physical InfrastructureSM (UPI) based solutions give enterprises the capabilities to connect, manage and automate communications, computing, power, control and security systems for a smarter, unified business foundation. Strong relationships with technology leaders complemented with its global staff and unmatched service and support, make Panduit a valuable and trusted partner. (www.panduit.com) About IBM: For more information, please visit www.ibm.com. Jen Pasek Panduit Corp. 708-532-1800 x81316 Fax: 708-570-1555 jpa@panduit.com www.panduit.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.author: None
entry.headline: OpenAmplify Adds Former Microsoft Corporate Vice President to Executive Board
entry.body: ANNAPOLIS, MD and LONDON, Aug 17 (MARKET WIRE) -- OpenAmplify, the Semantic Web platform, today announced that Sanjay Parthasarathy has joined its executive board. Parthasarathy brings over two decades of experience to the OpenAmplify team, most recently serving as corporate vice president of the Developer and Platform Evangelism Group (D) and also the Microsoft Startup Business Accelerator. Parthasarathy's appointment comes hot on the heels of OpenAmplify being awarded its 13th and 14th patents for its Natural Language Processing technology, and further strengthens the company's position as the leading provider of semantic analysis for companies looking to enhance customer engagement and improve monetization at scale. "Semantics is a must-have for any business looking to monetize their social initiatives, but the problem today is that many businesses still have no idea that semantics is their missing link," said Parthasarathy. "With my background and expertise in growing innovative businesses, I look forward to helping OpenAmplify execute on its social media and social network monetization strategy. They certainly have what it takes to become the leading semantic technology provider in the market." During his 19 years at Microsoft, Parthasarathy served as: corporate vice president of the Developer and Platform Evangelism Group (responsible for platform strategy and evangelism of the Microsoft platform to developers, IT professionals, students, and partners), general manager of Worldwide Customer Systems (helping make Microsoft's website one of the top five websites in the world) and regional director of Microsoft's South Asia Region. He originally joined the company in 1990 as a product manager in the Window's multimedia group. "Sanjay's appointment is a strong endorsement for OpenAmplify," says Mark Redgrave, OpenAmplify CEO. "Sanjay is a highly successful and passionate professional with hands-on experience in everything from launching start-ups to managing billion dollar P With new customers and partners joining us every month, the addition of Sanjay couldn't come at a better time." About OpenAmplify OpenAmplify (www.OpenAmplify.com) is a semantic web service that brings human understanding to content. OpenAmplify uses patented Natural Language Processing technology, mimicking the human process of language understanding to identify the significant topics, brands, people, perspectives, emotions, intentions, actions and timescales contained in online text. The Web service returns the meaning in English-language content in usable and actionable data structures including XML and RDF, thereby enabling other solutions providers to create value, profit and grow. Contact: Jessica Fletcher 646.202.9753 Jessica.fletcher@horngroup.com Sam Grace openamplify@marlinpr.com +44 (0)207 869 8314 Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Sceptre Investment Counsel Selects Jatheon Technologies to Replace Its Problematic IBM Email Archiving System
entry.body: TORONTO, Aug 17 (MARKET WIRE) -- Jatheon Technologies, a world leader in email archiving and management solutions, today announced that Sceptre Investment Counsel Limited (TSX: SZ), a leading Canadian independent investment management firm, has selected Jatheon's email archiving solution to replace its current IBM email archiving platform. After originally purchasing an IBM email archiving system, Sceptre was forced to look for a replacement email archiving solution that was easier to install and capable of meeting its demanding email communication and eDiscovery requirements. After evaluating many different email archiving options on the market, Sceptre selected Jatheon for its vast feature set, ease of use, and fast turn-key deployment. "Jatheon was selected by Sceptre as the most suitable email system that could meet our main email archiving objectives; simple to install, easy to use, and cost effective. The rich feature set and intuitive interface of the Jatheon appliance is far more superior to our old IBM system," said Randy MacFarland with Sceptre Investment Counsel Ltd. "The migration of our data to the Jatheon system only took 20 minutes and we were up and running. Locating a single email use to be time and resource intensive; with Jatheon we can identify a single email using search criteria such as keyword or phrase and retrieve it in seconds." "The selection by Sceptre Investment Counsel is a remarkable validation of the value of Jatheon as a comprehensive email archiving solution for eDiscovery, simplified user search, retention and retrieval of mission critical data," said Kieron Dowling, President at Jatheon Technologies. "We are pleased to be selected as the best of the archiving solutions Sceptre evaluated and we look forward to working with them." For more information about Jatheon email archiving solutions visit http://www.jatheon.com About Jatheon Technologies Jatheon Technologies, a world-wide leader in email archiving and management solutions, is the force behind Plug n Comply(TM), a family of email archiving appliances which greatly simplify eDiscovery and message archiving compliance, including meeting the requirements set by SEC, NASD (FINRA), HIPAA, FRCP, and Sarbanes Oxley. Highly secure, easy to manage, and infinitely scalable, Jatheon's integrated archiving appliances offer complete in-house control of confidential messaging data, such as email or instant messages. Available through a global network of valued business partners, Jatheon's solutions are optimized for simple installation and secure management with any mail server, including Exchange(TM), Notes(TM), and Groupwise(TM). Founded in 2004 and honored with Deloitte's Top 10 Companies-to-Watch Award in 2006, Jatheon is headquartered in Toronto, Canada. For more information, please visit http://www.jatheon.com. Plug n Comply(TM) is a trademark of Jatheon Technologies, Inc. All other names, brands, or products may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. Contact Information: Jatheon Technologies, Inc. Juliet Suddaby jsuddaby@jatheon.com 416. 840.0418 www.jatheon.com Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: A Worthy Free Replacement Fills the Microsoft Windows` HyperTerminal Void at www.clearconnex.com/freedownload
entry.body: RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C.--(Business Wire)-- With the releases of Windows Vista and Windows 7, Microsoft made a decision that left wireless device software developers scrambling. They decided to no longer ship the HyperTerminal application with their operating systems. ClearConnex has stepped in to fill the void with ClearTerminal, a free Windows compatible download available at www.clearconnex.com/freedownload. ClearTerminal is a terminal application program focused on the needs of wireless device developers. The free full-featured tool set is the type of terminal application that used to ship with Microsoft operating systems. ClearTerminal represents another example of how ClearConnex continues to find new ways to simplify M2M device software development and speed time to market. ClearTerminal fills a void. Ryan Rangel, CTO of ClearConnex, explains, "Without HyperTerminal, there are no free downloads to provide the comprehensive tool set that`s necessary for M2M device software development. Besides ClearTerminal, that is." Rangel believes there are many advantages to the HyperTerminal-like tool. "It`s free, it`s user friendly and it has even more useful features for wireless developers than the Microsoft Windows version of HyperTerminal ever did. You can`t get all that with any other free terminal program." The future is bright. Right now looks great, too. Rangel plans big things for future releases of ClearTerminal. "We`re going to add manufacturing testing features and scripting for device regression testing as well as integration with our ClearComm test server to help customers develop with our ClearComm software device platform." ClearTerminal supports Microsoft Windows XP, Microsoft Windows Vista and Microsoft Windows 7. You can download ClearTerminal for free at www.clearconnex.com/freedownload. About ClearConnex RTP, North Carolina-based ClearConnex specializes in products and services that provide a platform for building time-to-market-enhanced, pre-configured, customizable, hardware agnostic, wireless software solutions-an industry first. To learn more about ClearConnex Solutions, contact Manuel Zepeda or Ryan Rangel at 919-349-5736. Or visit www.clearconnex.com. ClearConnex Solutions Manuel Zepeda or Ryan Rangel, 919-349-5736 Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.author: None
entry.headline: MOVES-Goldman Sachs, Tullett Prebon, Marsh
entry.body:
Aug 17 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes, send an email to moves@thomsonreuters.com.

GOLDMAN SACHS ASSET MANAGEMENT

The asset management arm of Goldman Sachs Group Inc (GS.N) appointed Kathleen Hughes as global co-head of its cash distribution business. Hughes, who was formerly at JP Morgan's (JPM.N) asset management unit as managing director and head of global liquidity, will assume her new role in September and will be based in London.

TULLETT PREBON PLC (TLPR.L)

The brokerage services provider said it appointed Christopher McGuigan as head of the Americas for its Tullett Prebon Information unit. McGuigan was most recently with MarketAxess where he managed its data services business.

MARSH

The unit of Marsh McLennan Cos (MMC.N) said it promoted Richard Waterer to the newly created role of head of operational risk for its Marsh Risk Consulting unit in the UK.

WORLD GOLD COUNCIL

The World Gold Council appointed David Badham as the head of investment marketing for Europe, effective immediately. Badham will be based in the council's London office and joins from the Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS.L) where he served as EMEA head of communications and marketing for global markets.

ACCRETIVE SOLUTIONS

The consulting and executive search firm said late on Monday it named Richard Moran as vice-chairman of the firm's board of directors. Moran is a San Francisco-based venture capitalist, author and expert on organizational effectiveness.

Separately, the firm also named David Martin to its board of directors. Martin currently serves as vice-chairman of CityView, an institutional investment firm.

WADDELL REED FINANCIAL INC (WDR.N)

The asset management unit said late on Monday it named Philip Sanders as chief investment officer of its two investment subsidiaries, Waddell Reed Investment Management Co and Ivy Investment Management Co.

To read more, please double-click on [ID:nN16183098] (Compiled by Siddharth Cavale in Bangalore)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Microsoft's Kinect to hit EMEA stores Nov 10
entry.body:
COLOGNE, Germany (Reuters) - Microsoft's motion-sensing game system Kinect will hit European retail stores before Christmas, the company said, as it battles for customers with rivals Sony and Nintendo.

Kinect, which enables the player to control games with the body, voice and hand gestures, will go on sale in Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA) from November 10, four days after its U.S. launch, the company said on Tuesday, a day ahead of Gamescom, Europe's largest video game trade show.

A spokeswoman said Microsoft would sell the European version of Kinect for 149.99 euros ($192.1), compared with a retail price of $149.99 in the United States.

Microsoft hopes to steal customers from the rival Nintendo Wii and Sony Playstation 3 as all three big console makers struggle to breathe new life into the ailing console market. Motion-controlled gaming is one of the industry's big hopes.

According to research firm iSuppli, unit shipments of video game consoles are expected to fall by 7.5 percent to 48.2 million by 2013. Video game producers such as Electronic Arts also see the new motion-controlled devices as reigniting the $60 billion video game hardware and software industry.

Sony earlier this year announced Move, its motion-controlled feature for the PlayStation 3, which will hit European stores on September 15. Unlike Kinect, Move employs a wand-like game controller, similar to that of Nintendo's Wii, which revolutionized motion-controlled gaming about four years ago.

($1=.7804 Euro)

(Reporting by Christoph Steitz; Editing by Erica Billingham)

FILED UNDER:

entry.headline: Microsoft's Kinect to hit EMEA stores Nov 10
entry.body:
* Kinect to cost 150 eur vs $150 in the United States

* Sony's rival Move to hit European stores Sept. 15

COLOGNE, Germany Aug 17 (Reuters) - Microsoft's (MSFT.O) motion-sensing game system Kinect will hit European retail stores before Christmas, the company said, as it battles for customers with rivals Sony (6758.T) and Nintendo (7974.T).

Kinect, which enables the player to control games with the body, voice and hand gestures, will go on sale in Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA) from Nov. 10, four days after its U.S. launch, the company said on Tuesday, a day ahead of Gamescom, Europe's largest video game trade show.

A spokeswoman said Microsoft would sell the European version of Kinect for 149.99 euros ($192.1), compared with a retail price of $149.99 in the United States. [ID:nN20272039]

Microsoft hopes to steal customers from the rival Nintendo (7974.T) Wii and Sony (6758.T) Playstation 3 as all three big console makers struggle to breathe new life into the ailing console market. Motion-controlled gaming is one of the industry's big hopes.

According to research firm iSuppli, unit shipments of video game consoles are expected to fall by 7.5 percent to 48.2 million by 2013. Video game producers such as Electronic Arts ERTS.O also see the new motion-controlled devices as reigniting the $60 billion video game hardware and software industry. [ID:nWEA4327]

Sony earlier this year announced Move, its motion-controlled feature for the PlayStation 3, which will hit European stores on Sept. 15. Unlike Kinect, Move employs a wand-like game controller, similar to that of Nintendo's Wii, which revolutionised motion-controlled gaming about four years ago.

($1=.7804 Euro)

(Reporting by Christoph Steitz; Editing by Erica Billingham)

entry.headline: US visa restrictions not WTO compatible: India official
entry.body:
NEW DELHI Aug 17 (Reuters) - Recent visa restrictions imposed by the United States are not compatible with World Trade Organisation (WTO) regulations, a senior Indian government official said on Tuesday.

The U.S. Congress passed legislation on Thursday to strengthen security along the border with Mexico, trying to tackle the politically sensitive issue of illegal immigrants ahead of November congressional elections.

The Indian government has protested to Washington against what it called a highly discriminatory U.S. immigration bill that will double the cost of work visas for some high-profile Indian companies.

Funds for the bill will be raised through visa fee hikes that U.S. Senate aides say would affect India's Tata Consultancy Services (TCS.BO), Infosys Technologies (INFY.BO), Wipro (WIPR.BO) and Mahindra Satyam SATY.BO.

"Yes, this is WTO incompatible. I have no doubt about it," Trade Secretary Rahul Khullar said when asked whether the recent visa restrictions were incompatible with WTO regulations.

Indian Trade Minister Anand Sharma said that bill would cost Indian companies an extra $200 million a year and erode the competitiveness of Indian companies that send professionals to undertake projects in the United States.

However, analysts are sceptical about whether India can drag the United States to the WTO on this issue.

"We have a case against the US only if we can prove that the visa restrictions were aimed specifically against India. So we have to study the law and cannot immediately say it is not WTO compliant," said an analyst with a Delhi-based think-tank dealing with trade issues.

The analyst did not wish to be identified.

Khullar also said that the export outlook for India remains uncertain for the next six months but there is no need to change the 2011 export target as of now.

India's July exports were up more than 13 percent, Khullar said. He also told reporters that as of now India's current account deficit is manageable.

The deficit INCURA=ECI widened to $13 billion in the January-March quarter, the biggest since 1981, compared to $12.2 billion in October-December, official data showed.

(Reporting by Rajesh Kumar Singh, editing by Sugita Katyal)

((rajeshkumar.singh@thomsonreuters.com; +91-11-4178-1056; Reuters Messaging: rajeshkumar.singh.reuters.com@reuters.net))

((If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)) Keywords: INDIA ECONOMY/TRADESECRETARY

entry.headline: Microsoft revolutioniert die Unterhaltung zuhause und unterwegs mit der Einführung von Kinect und neuen Xbox LIVE-Erlebnissen auf Windows Phone 7 und PC
entry.body: Kinect für Xbox 360 bringt ab dem 10. November 2010 controllerfreie Unterhaltung nach Europa KÖLN, Deutschland--(Business Wire)-- Die Xbox wird in diesem Jahr für ein neuartiges Unterhaltungserlebnis zuhause und unterwegs sorgen, wenn Kinect für Xbox 360 am 10. November in Europa, Nahost und Afrika1 offiziell auf den Markt kommt und den Nutzern eine neue Welt von controllerfreiem Spielspaß und Xbox Live-Erfahrungen eröffnet. Darüber hinaus steht der Marktauftritt von Xbox LIVE und einer Reihe von Blockbuster-Spielen für Windows Phone 7 in der kommenden Weihnachtssaison an und Microsoft hat eine neue Palette von LIVE-fähigen Titeln für den PC angekündigt. Die europäische Premiere von Kinect für Xbox 360 findet auf der Gamescom 2010 statt und wird Millionen weitere Menschen mit der intuitiven Freiheit des Spielens ohne Controller bekannt machen. Auf der Fachmesse werden neue Spiele und Erfahrungen vorgestellt, welche den Besuchern die Tiefe und die Breite des Startsortiments von über 15 exklusiven Kinect-Titeln vor Augen führen, darunter nie zuvor gesehene Levels, neue Umgebungen, Aufgaben und Charaktere für „Kinect Sports", „Kinect Adventures", „Kinectimals" und „Kinect Joyride". Außerdem werden MTV Games und Harmonix neue erstklassige Dancetracks für das mit Spannung erwartete „Dance Central" präsentieren. Im Vorfeld der Messe sagte Chris Lewis, Vice President, Interactive Entertainment Business, Microsoft Europe: „Wir bringen die Kinect-Erfahrung auf der Gamescom zum ersten Mal nach Europa, denn sie ist die größte Messe der Region und da uns ihre kritische Rolle für den globalen Erfolg der Xbox bewusst ist, setzen wir unsere Investitionen in Europa entschlossen fort. Wenn Kinect am 10. November auf den Markt kommt, ist dies nicht nur ein Wendepunkt für unser Geschäft sondern auch für die Art und Weise, auf die Unterhaltungsangebote genutzt werden. Sie selbst werden der Controller und können entscheiden, wie Sie und Ihre Freunde durch Unterhaltungs- und Spielerlebnisse navigieren. Wir sehen bereits einen hohen Grad von Vorfreude in Europa, wo die Umsätze der Kinect-bereiten Xbox 360 250GB den wöchentlichen Marktanteil2 auf ein neues Rekordniveau gehoben haben." „Dies ist außerdem das Jahr der Expansion für die Xbox 360 im Hinblick auf neue Publikumssegmente sowie neue Märkte für Xbox LIVE und verschiedene Plattformen. Mit Xbox LIVE auf Windows Phone 7 liefern wir den Gamern unterwegs die Qualität, die Beständigkeit und die Community, welche die Xbox-Erfahrung auszeichnen. Mit ‚Age of Empires Online`, ‚Fable III` und noch in der Entwicklung befindlichen neuen Spielen bringen wir darüber hinaus sozial vernetzte Spielerlebnisse zu allen Publikumsgruppen am PC. Angesichts unserer diesjährigen Neuerscheinungen mit dem Zauber von Kinect und unserem Lineup von Blockbuster-Spielen, darunter der größte Titel des Jahres 2010: ‚Halo: Reach` sind wir zuversichtlich, dass die Xbox 360 der gesamten Familie etwas zu bieten hat und die Spiel- und Unterhaltungskonsole des Jahres 2010 und darüber hinaus wird." Noch mehr Spaß mit Kinect Die neuen Kinect-Spielerfahrungen, die auf der Gamescom enthüllt werden, offenbaren eine noch nie zuvor gesehene Tiefe von controllerfreien Spielen, die den gelegentlichen Nutzer wie auch Hardcore-Gamer stundenlang unterhalten wird. Auf der Messe wird der Kart-Racing-Klassiker „Kinect Joy Ride" mit neuen Modi zu sehen sein, welche das Spielerlebnis frisch und spannend halten, egal ob man es allein oder zusammen mit Freunden spielt, sowie aufregende neue Abenteuer an exotischen Orten auf der Jagd nach Schätzen und Belohnungen in „Kinect Adventures". Eine Reihe von süßen neuen vierbeinigen Freunden, die Ihnen auf einer Entdeckungsreise durch die Welt der „Kinectimals" zur Seite stehen und drei neue Events in „Kinect Sports" welche die Familie garantiert vom Sofa reißen, werden außerdem erstmals auf der Messe vorgestellt. Die Blockbuster werden größer Im Jahr 2010 sind alle Blockbuster auf der Xbox 360 erhältlich und das unfassbare Sortiment von Drittanbietern beweist erneut, dass die Xbox 360 die beste Spieleplattform ist. Dazu gehören die mit Spannung erwarteten Hit-Titel „Halo:Reach" und „Fable III" mit erweitertem Funktionsumfang, die auf der Gamescom zu sehen sein werden. Ein neues Zeitalter für mobiles Gaming Auf der Gamescom 2010 wird auch die erste Welle von Xbox LIVE-Spielen enthüllt, die in dieser Weihnachtssaison auf Windows Phone 7 erhältlich sein werden. Im Anschluss an die Pionierarbeit, die Microsoft mit der Xbox 360 geleistet hat, wird das Handybetriebssystem Windows Phone 7 ein erstklassiges und immer größer werdendes Portfolio von Xbox LIVE-Titeln beherbergen, die von den kreativsten Köpfen in der Spieleentwicklung, wie den Microsoft Games Studios, geschaffen wurden. Von Avatars zu Abenteuern, Freunden und noch viel mehr gibt Ihnen Windows Phone 7 die Leistungsstärke von Xbox LIVE direkt in die Hand. Neuauftritt klassischer PC-Titel Microsoft wird außerdem den neuesten Zugang zu seinen überaus erfolgreichen „Age of Empires"-Titeln präsentieren: „Age of Empires Online". Indem es modernste Online-Funktionen mit dem klassischen Spielkonzept verbindet, wird „Age of Empires Online" sowohl langjährige Fans als auch Anfänger überzeugen, sowie alle, die dazwischen liegen. Microsoft gibt auch die Entwicklung eines neuen Spiels bekannt, das an die altbewährte „Flight Simulator"-Marke anknüpft. Diese neuen Titel von Microsoft Game Studios sowie das zuvor angekündigte „Fable III" haben den kostenlosen3 Onlineservice „Games for Windows- LIVE" komplett integriert, um den Nutzern überzeugende und sozial vernetzte Spielerlebnisse zu bieten. ENDE Über Kinect Kinect für Xbox 360 macht Spiele und Unterhaltung auf außerordentliche neue Weisen lebendig - ganz ohne Controller. Dank seiner unkomplizierten Bedienung und seinem mitreißenden Spielspaß lässt Kinect für Xbox 360 den Nutzer direkt in Kinect-fähige Spiele aller Arten eintauchen und mit dem Kinect Hub finden Sie alle Ihre Lieblings-TV-Programme, Musiktitel, Live-Sportübertragungen und sozialen Medien an einem Platz. Der Kinect-Sensor erkennt Sie, reagiert auf Ihre Gesten, hört auf Ihre Stimme und funktioniert mit jeder Xbox 360-Konsole (Speicherbedarf: 175 MB). Weitere Informationen über Kinect für Xbox 360 finden Sie unter http://www.xbox.com/kinect. Über die Xbox 360 Die Xbox 360 ist ein erstklassiges Videospiel- und Entertainmentsystem. Diesen November kommt Kinect für die Xbox 360 auf den Markt und wird das Erlebnis von sozialen Spielen und Entertainment mit einer völlig neuen Spielweise ein für alle Mal verändern - ganz ohne Controller. Auf der Xbox 360 ist darüber hinaus die beste und umfassendste Spieleauswahl sowie die größte Sammlung von On-Demand-Musik, Filmen in Standard- und HD-Auflösung, TV-Sendungen und digitalen Spielen zuhause. Als das Unterhaltungszentrum im Wohnzimmer vereint die Xbox 360 ein unschlagbares Inhaltsangebot mit der riesigen Xbox LIVE-Community, der 25 Millionen Mitglieder angehören, und schafft so ein grenzenloses Entertainmenterlebnis, an dem man zuhause oder in der ganzen Welt teilhaben kann. Weitere Informationen über die Xbox 360 finden Sie online unter: http://www.xbox.com. Über Xbox LIVE Xbox LIVE ist der Online-Entertainment-Service für Ihre Xbox 360, der Sie mit einer ständig größer werdenden Welt von Spielen, Filmen, Fernsehserien, Musik, Sport und sozialer Unterhaltung verbindet. Auf Xbox LIVE können Sie die besten Spiele spielen, die größte On-Demand-Bibliothek aller Konsolen genießen, Millionen von Songs hören und zusammen mit Ihren Freunden auf der ganzen Welt Spaß haben. Xbox LIVE ist das exklusive Zuhause der controllerfreien Online-unterheltung mit Kinect, das Ihre Xbox 360 noch intuitiver und interaktiver als je zuvor macht. Mit einer aktiven Community von 25 Millionen Menschen in 26 Ländern, die in diesem Herbst auf 36 Länder erweitert wird, bietet Xbox LIVE Ihnen zusammen mit der Xbox 360 sofortigen Zugang zu der Unterhaltung, die Sie wollen und lässt Sie diese mit den Menschen teilen, die Ihnen am Herzen liegen, egal wo Sie sich aufhalten. Weitere Informationen über Xbox LIVE finden Sie online unter: http://www.xbox.com/live. Über Microsoft Microsoft (Nasdaq „MSFT") wurde 1975 gegründet und ist Weltmarktführer bei Software, Dienstleistungen und Lösungen, mit denen Menschen und Unternehmen ihr volles Potenzial erreichen können. 1 Großbritannien, Irland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Spanien, Italien, Norwegen, Schweden, Finnland, Dänemark, Österreich, Belgien, Portugal, Schweiz, Holland, Südafrika, Russland, Vereinigte Arabischen Emirate, Saudi-Arabien, Ungarn, Tschechische Republik, Slowakei, Polen. 2 In Frankreich, Deutschland, Großbritannien und Irland 3 Breitband-Internet erforderlich Die Ausgangssprache, in der der Originaltext veröffentlicht wird, ist die offizielle und autorisierte Version.
